title: Spare hours...
author: Brown, John
snippet: A geologist will tell you the exact structure of that rock in the Tay at Campsie Linn, where Mr. Briggs is carrying out that huge salmon in his arms, tenderly and safely, as if it were his first-born.

title: Rab,
author: Brown, John

title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: It arose onthe summit ofa precipitous rock, which descends onthe princely river, there rendered peculiarly remarkable by the cataract called Campsie Linn, where itswaters rush tumultuously over a range of basallicrock which intercepts the current, Uke a dike erectedby human hands.
